summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2622 for the improvement of Twenty-seventh Avenue from East Union Street to East Cherry Street, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same and constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 30696, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
